
### mapping arrays to cache sets  {.smaller}


* 2KB direct-mapped cache w/ 16B blocks
* $\\rightarrow{}$ values 2KB apart map to same set 

   * mapping wraps around to beginning of cache
   * 2K = $2^(\\text{index bits} + \\text{offset bits})$ s
 
<hr class="vspace" />
* array[0--3] and array[512--515] map to same set
* array[4--7] and array[516--519] map to same set
